choose.when: select a.no, a.title, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.depth, b.name as userName, a.user_no as userNo from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{startIndex }, #{size }
choose.otherwise: select a.no, a.title, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.depth, b.name as userName, a.user_no as userNo from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no and (title like '%${keyword }%' or contents like '%${keyword }%') order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{startIndex }, #{size }

mapper.select: select no,title,contents,hit,user_no from board where no=#{no}

select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i:%s') as regDate, g_no as gNo, o_no as oNo, a.depth, b.name as userName, a.user_no as userNo from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no and a.no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into board values(null,#{title},#{contents},0,now(),(select ifnull(max(g_no),0)+1 from board b),1,1,#{userNo})
mapper.update: update board set o_no=#{oNo}+1 where g_no=#{gNo} and o_no>=#{oNo}+1;
update board set hit=hit+1 where no=#{no}
update board set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} where no=#{no}

choose.otherwise: select count(*) from board where (title like '%${_parameter }%' or contents like '%${_parameter }%')
